document_data.name: Jarda
document_data.mainbody: '''Jarda''' was a [[halfling]] [[sa'luk]] inhabiting [[Huzuz]], the City of Delights, in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}
document_data.Personality: Jarda was a shrewd professional who distrusted others until they proved otherwise. Because of her paranoia she frequently dressed as a male to make it harder for anyone tracking her.
document_data.Description: Because of her craving for sweets, which she often stole while roaming the city, Jarda developed a bit of a paunch.
document_data.Possessions: Jarda owned a pair of ''[[bracers of defense|bracers of defense +5]]'', a magical [[short sword]], a ''[[philter of glibness]]'', and an assortment of thieving tools.
document_data.Rumors & Legends: Though she was a successful adventurer in her own right, Jarda was actually a trusted agent of Prince [[Tannous al-Assad]] and frequently ran special errands for him.
